review: Works very good, but a little different than my other 2 Rokus, so I have to operate differently...just took getting used to.
author: George Henne "Submatey"

review: A little time consuming signing in and a little confusing, but once we were signed up, it worked great.
author: Kathleen Bruce

review: Quick way to access tv shows, movies, and lots of new stuff.
author: David Hall

review: Fire TV stick was very easy to install and implement.  However, one small complaint.  I switched from Netflix discs to Amazon Fire TV and cannot view movies I had on my DVD list without paying an additional amount.  I will have to wait a while to watch these films.  Hopefully, Amazon and Netflix will rectify this soon.I do love the free Netflix series such as Marco Polo, and I am looking forward to viewing Lillyhammer as well.
author: D.C.G. "The Chairman"

review: exellent product ... great price...easy to install
author: curtross

review: Works but not sure what you get here that you don't already get from direct tv and netflix. If we didn't already have amazon prime, would probably not recommend.
author: C. Highfield
